channel.title: Need help with mopar and silab items
channel.description:
I want to make it so, if a player on silab clients puts on a skill cape, for those who are on mopar instead of seeing the skill cape, they see a normal cape. so it makes the player visible. I need this bad!
Example...
Silabplayer puts on a skill cape. Every silabplayer can see that skill cape. but all the moparscape players see a normal blackcape.
|||Is this even possible??|||
Thanks!

item.title: Need help with mopar and silab items
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

How do we put skillcapes on our own client and also make it a webclient? Possible?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar and silab items

item.title: Need help with mopar and silab items
item.dc:creator: @ryanandmatt ryanandmatt
item.description:
@ryanandmatt wrote:

ya its not possible unless the next albert einstein invents it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar and silab items

item.title: Need help with mopar and silab items
item.dc:creator: @HahBahGee HahBahGee
item.description:
@HahBahGee wrote:

It ISNT possible for Silab BUT it is possible if you made your own client…

you would look up the black cape ID on moparscape, then use that ID for whatever skillcape ID you wanted on your own server…

That way if you used it on moparscape it would be a black cape, but on your own client it would be a skillcape. You then would jsut require others to either us ONLY mopar or YOUR CLIENT to play the server…

hope this helped

~HBG

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar and silab items
